messages.subject: (early) Happy Mother's Day
messages.msgSnippet: In the Beginning God created the World and populated it with Children. .... and after a time, He looked down and said: Heavens! This place is a ZOO!! So He
messages.messageBody:
In the Beginning
God created the World
and populated it with Children.

.... and after a time, He looked down and said:
"Heavens! This place is a ZOO!!"

So He created Pets.

.... and after a time, He looked down and said:
"What an ungodly MESS! You kids need a shepherd!"

So He created Dads.

.... and after a time, He looked down and WAS ASTONISHED!!!
To see the whole works going
Straight to HELL IN A HANDBASKET!!!!

So He created ** MOMS **

.... and after a time, The Lord looked down and He said:

* * * THIS IS GOOD * * *


Happy Mother's Day


Love Kandi
* We can do no great things; only small things with great love. *
-Mother Teresa
